comment: possibly three-step reaction (similar to R10682, R07450+R07451+R07471)
definition: 6-Deoxotyphasterol + 3 Oxygen + 3 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> 7-Oxatyphasterol + 4 H2O + 3 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]
name: 6-deoxotyphasterol,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (7-oxatyphasterol-forming)
